Reviews.Title: LG Phone
Reviews.Author: Catherine E. Rudolph
Reviews.Content: The LG phone I ordered for my granddaughter arrived sooner than expected, carefully packaged and exactly as described. She is very happy with it. And I am very happy with the supplier, Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Red EnV
Reviews.Author: Josh M
Reviews.Content: Phone works as expected. This is the 4th Env I have purchased. Only complaint would be that phone was originally silver and through usual wear and tear the red finish is getting scraped off, but not a big issue. Very pleased overall.
